publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4066 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to St Johnstone FC—That the Parliament congratulates St Johnstone Football Club in capturing the First Division championship and wishes the club well on its deserved return to the Scottish Premier League next season.
S3M-4066 Congratulations to St Johnstone FC (lodged on 5 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4066 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to St Johnstone FC—That the Parliament congratulates St Johnstone Football Club in capturing the First Division championship and wishes the club well on its deserved return to the Scottish Premier League next season. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell*
